targets.query: SELECT last("NewDownstreamCurrRate") *1000 FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("sendrate") FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("sendrate") FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT last("NewUpstreamCurrRate") *1000 FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("crc_errors"), 10s) FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("crc_errors"), 10s) FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT last("value") FROM "fritzbox" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'uptime') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("totalbytessent"))) FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("totalbytesreceived"))) FROM "fritzbox" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('Europe/Berlin')
